body: There are a couple of nice stories here to read with nice art. ### The english and anime sources for the animations featured near the end of magazine are (both from same manga artist Takeda Hiromitsu and both animations from same studio by Mary Jane (good shit!)): First story is 'Ajisai no Chiru Koro ni' ***Manga: https://nhentai.net/g/208223/ *** ***Anime: https://hanime.tv/videos/hentai/ajisai-no-chiru-koro-ni-1 *** Second story is 'Himawari wa Yoru ni Saku' ***Manga: https://nhentai.net/g/225482/ *** ***Anime: https://hanime.tv/videos/hentai/himawari-wa-yoru-ni-saku-1 *** Enjoy! WARNING: BOTH CONTAINS NETORARE (NTR).
